Description: Fantastic 2 bedroom duplex apartment in great central Watertown location! Easy access to Main St., Belmont St., Waltham, Belmont, Cambridge, Boston, buses, shops, restaurants, etc. Hardwood floors. Living room, dining area and very nice kitchen with dishwasher on 1st floor. 2 Bedroom and a full bath on 2nd floor. Full basement with ample storage and laundry. Parking for 2. Awesome back yard. First/Last/Fee. Great place!!
